original_title: Hoshimachi Suisei 1st Solo Live "STELLAR into the GALAXY"
overview: A girl appears like a comet, shining small and bright. Her glorious singing voice overlaps with more than a million stars. Finally, the first stage arrives. Hoshimachi Suisei 1st solo live, STELLAR into the GALAXY. Let's observe together a dreamlike moment spent in the galaxy.
title: Hoshimachi Suisei 1st Solo Live "STELLAR into the GALAXY"
